bike.description: A6-SL custom-butted alloy w/ shaped top tube & integrated tapered head tube w/ 1 1/2" lower, oversized 34.9mm round seat tube, PIIS BB86 shell, double water bottle mounts
sizes: XS/S (48cm), S (50cm), S/M (52cm), M (54cm), M/L (56cm), L (58cm), XL (60cm)

components.description: A6-SL custom-butted alloy, forged-road dropout w/ post mount disc mount and replaceable derailleur hanger
FC-770 Cross carbon blade, alloy crown w/ tapered alloy steerer & alloy dropout
Shimano Tiagra STI shifter/brake combo, Flight Deck-compatible, 20-speed
Vera Corsa aero alloy clincher, 24/28H precision disc hubs
Challenge Grifo clincher, 60 tpi, 700c x 32mm, folding
Avid BB5 mechanical disc for road, 160mm / 140mm rotors
FSA Orbit C-40, 1 1/8" upper - 1 1/2" lower, integrated
Oval R500 w/ CrMo hollow rails
